content:
So I think I might have accidentally started a thing...

Joe Moeller was wondering why there's been only one topic in #learning: history of ideas so far, so I thought I'd start a new topic to talk about starting new topics. Yay recursivity!

Then John Baez really liked my suggestion of AMAs (Ask Me Anything) to surface the history of ideas behind careers, particularly those that are on this Zulip server. So right now we have:

  • #learning: history of ideas > History of Ideas AMA: John Baez
  • #learning: history of ideas > History of Ideas AMA: Valeria de Paiva

Feel free to go there and ask them questions.
